TopicTitle: International construction ISS in Kerbal orbit.

Articles.Content: bobcat has stated he doesn't want to do them, you can learn and do it, he'd gladly accept it (probably). Also we'd help you with it if you needed help.

You killed me on this one x) I would do it if only my knowledges in graphical design were a bit more develloped than drawing squares in paint. Anyway, I was just giving idea to improve this mod, not forcing anyone to do anything.

Hey, question for hopefully bobcat: When the ksp update comes out were it has enhanced EVA, ie you can walk inside the ship, if it brakes the insides will they be fixed (I don't think they will brake). even though this update is still early development, i'm just wondering. Thanks
At the moment only one module has it's own interior and that's the Mir core/zarya

PMA-1 Zvezda to Unity

PMA-2 Harmony to Nothing (or when docked space shuttle)
